snippet: At least three Muslims were burned to death when their thatched huts were set on fire during a clash between Hindu and Muslim groups in a village in eastern India, a government official said Sunday.
lead_paragraph: At least three Muslims were burned to death when their thatched huts were set on fire during a clash between Hindu and Muslim groups in a village in eastern India, a government official said Sunday.

headline.main: India: 3 People Killed as Villagers Clash
headline.print_headline: India: 3 People Killed as Villagers Clash
